Item ID21009

The dragon sword is a drop from wyrms. To wield it, players require an Attack level of 60. Along with the leaf-bladed sword, the dragon sword is currently the best shortsword available in Old School RuneScape; Leaf-bladed sword has a slightly higher stab and slash bonus, but the dragon sword has a much higher strength bonus.

Special attack[edit | edit source]

A player performing the dragon sword's special attack, Wild Stab.

The dragon sword has a special attack, Wild Stab, that consumes 40% of the player's special attack energy to hit the target with 25% increased accuracy and damage. If the target is using Protect from Melee, the special attack will ignore the prayer for one attack. This special rolls off of the opponents stab defence regardless of which mode it is in.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
10 January 2019
(update | poll)

Following the release of Kebos Lowlands, dragon sword was moved from the Chambers of Xeric drop table to wyrms.

[[File:Dragon sword detail.png|left|130px]]
The '''dragon sword''' is a drop from [[wyrm]]s. To wield it, players require an [[Attack]] level of 60. Along with the [[leaf-bladed sword]], the dragon sword is currently the best [[shortsword]] available in ''[[Old School RuneScape]];'' [[Leaf-bladed sword]] has a slightly higher [[stab]] and [[slash]] bonus, but the dragon sword has a much higher [[strength bonus]].

==Special attack==
[[File:Wild Stab.gif|thumb|250px|A player performing the dragon sword's special attack, ''Wild Stab''.]]
The dragon sword has a [[special attack]], ''Wild Stab'', that consumes 40% of the player's [[special attack energy]] to hit the target with 25% increased accuracy and damage. If the target is using [[Protect from Melee]], the special attack will ignore the [[prayer]] for one attack. This special rolls off of the opponents stab defence regardless of which mode it is in.
